# Ignore settings.php
www/sites/default/settings.php

# Ignore files
www/sites/default/files/

# Ignore Mac files
.DS_STORE

# Ignore backups and temporary files
www/backup
www/sites/default/files/tmp/
tmp_files/*
!tmp_files/PLACEHOLDER.md
private_files/*
!private_files/PLACEHOLDER.md


# Ignore logs
log/

# Ignore devel themer and maillog modules
www/sites/all/modules/devel_themer
www/sites/all/modules/simplehtmldom

# Ignore all auto-generated patch files
PATCHES.txt
